article_title: Advocates urge health services for undocumented workers in Sacramento County
article_text: Sacramento County cut health services for undocumented immigrants in the depths of the financial crisis in 2009. Now county supervisors are weighing options to bring it back. State lawmakers are pursuing a broader solution.

article_metadata.news-keywords: undocumented, health care, sacramento county, supervisors
article_metadata.description: Sacramento County cut health services for undocumented immigrants in the depths of the financial crisis in 2009. Now county supervisors are weighing options to bring it back. State lawmakers are pursuing a broader solution.

Sacramento County cut health services for undocumented immigrants in the depths of the financial crisis in 2009.
Now county supervisors are weighing options to bring it back.
State lawmakers are pursuing a broader solution.
